description: Plaid, the software powering well-known fintech apps such as Venmo and Coinbase, has raised $310 million in venture capital funding to date. Head of people McKenna Quint said the company is 'Growing quickly but carefully': It's added about 200 employees over the past year and has over 100 positions open now.
name: Plaid
short_description: The software powering well-known fintech apps such as Venmo and Coinbase
